<A NAME="eolPage143"></A>
<A NAME="EX1035CREDITAGREEMENTFINAL_HTM_SC630534DAA546D3A624E1EAD483251D6">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:56PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Residual Amount, if any, to be transferred by Escrow Agent to the Residual Account on such Quarterly Payment Date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the avoidance of doubt, such Disbursement Instruction shall specify the Quarterly Payment Date on which such transfers are to be made by Escrow Agent pursuant to the Escrow Agreement and instruct Escrow Agent to make such transfers on such date.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;In the event Lenders and Borrower fail to jointly deliver to Escrow Agent the Disbursement Instruction at least two (2) Business Days prior to any Quarterly Payment Date, the parties hereto agree that so long as Halozyme has timely delivered to Borrower, the Collateral Agent and Lenders the notices described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.02(a), Halozyme shall have the right to deliver to Escrow Agent a duly executed written notice of the occurrence of such failure, setting forth: (i) the amount of Escrow Agent Fees described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 6.02(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	not previously reimbursed, if any, to be transferred by Escrow Agent to Halozyme on such Quarterly Payment Date (which amount shall be equal to the amount stated in such applicable notice); (ii) the account of Halozyme to which such funds are to be transferred under the Escrow Agreement; and (iii) the Quarterly Payment Date on which such transfers are to be made by Escrow Agent pursuant to the Escrow Agreement (a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Parent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disbursement I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	nstruction&#8221;). In the event any Lender has delivered an Event of Default Notice to Escrow Agent, the parties hereto further agree that so long as Halozyme has timely delivered to Borrower, the Collateral Agent and Lenders the notices described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.02(a), Halozyme shall have the right to deliver a Parent Disbursement Instruction to Escrow Agent.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:56PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	Section 6.04&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Disbursements upon Event of D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	efault.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	During the continuance of any Event of Default, any Lender, upon written notice to the Borrower, may notify Escrow Agent in writing that an Event of Default hereunder has occurred and is continuing (an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	of Default N
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	otice&#8221;);
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rovided,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	owever, that upon the occurrence of an Event of Default specified in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.01(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	with respect to Borrower, any Lender may deliver an Event of Default Notice to Escrow Agent without any notice to the Borrower.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The parties hereto acknowledge and agree that in the event Escrow Agent receives an Event of Default Notice, Escrow Agent shall not make any disbursements from the Escrow Account in accordance with any pending or future Joint Disbursement Instruction, until such time as Escrow Agent receives written notice from Lenders that such Event of Default no longer exists;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rovided,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	owever, that, notwithstanding the foregoing, Escrow Agent shall continue to make disbursements from the Escrow Account only to the extent in accordance with any pending or future Parent Disbursement Instruction.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	At such time as an Event of Default is no longer continuing, if any Lender has delivered an Event of Default Notice to Escrow Agent in respect of such Event of Default, Borrower shall promptly notify Escrow Agent in writing that such Event of Default no longer exists.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	36
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage144"></A>
<A NAME="EX1035CREDITAGREEMENTFINAL_HTM_SC630534DAA546D3A624E1EAD483251D6">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:240%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;PADDING-LEFT:273PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	ARTICLE VII
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	DEFAULT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:125%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	Section 7.01&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Events of D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	efault.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The occurrence and continuance of any of the following shall constitute an Event of Default, whatever the reason for such event and whether it shall be voluntary or involuntary, or within or without the control of the Borrower, or be effected by operation of law or pursuant to any judgment or order of any court or any order, rule or regulation of any governmental or nongovernmental body:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any payment of principal of the Loan or the Notes, including any payment of Prepayment Premium applicable thereto, shall not be made within three (3) Business Days of when such payment is due and payable hereunder;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any Loan Document Representation and Warranty shall at any time prove to have been incorrect or misleading in any material respect when made;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any Loan Party shall fail to perform or observe its respective obligations under:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:56PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(A)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any term, covenant, condition or agreement contained in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.01(a)(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(insofar as such Section requires the preservation of the limited liability company existence of Borrower),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.01(a)(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	iv),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.02,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.04(a),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.04(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, and Sections
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5.05
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;through
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.15; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:56PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(B)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	any term, covenant, condition or agreement contained in this Agreement (other than a term, covenant, condition or agreement a failure in the performance or observance of which is elsewhere in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.01
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	specifically addressed) or any other Loan Document and, if capable of being remedied, such failure shall continue unremedied for a period of thirty (30) days after such Loan Party obtains knowledge of any such default;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Halozyme shall fail to perform or observe
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 10.14(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	hereof, which failure is not cured within thirty (30) days after written demand thereof by the Collateral Agent or the Required Lenders;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The occurrence of any failure by Baxalta to pay any material amount, or other material breach or default by Baxalta, under the Baxalta License Agreement, or any material delay, elimination or material diminution of the amounts paid or payable by Baxalta under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	4.6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Baxalta License Agreement with respect to Post-Closing Royalty Amounts, in each case, only if and to the extent caused by or resulting from an actual breach or default by Halozyme of any of its obligations under the Baxalta License Agreement;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The occurrence of any failure by Roche to pay any material amount, or other material breach or default by Roche, under the Roche License Agreement, or any material delay, elimination or material diminution of the amounts paid or payable by Roche under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	4.6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Roche License Agreement with respect to Post-Closing Royalty Amounts, in each case, only if and to the extent caused by or resulting from a breach or default by Halozyme of any of its obligations under the Roche License Agreement;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(g)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	This Agreement shall for any reason fail to be in full force and effect or fail to be effective to give the Collateral Agent a valid and perfected first priority security interest in and Lien upon any and all of the Collateral (subject only to Permitted Liens), or any Loan Party (or any of its Affiliates) asserts, or institutes any proceedings seeking to establish, that any provision of the Loan Documents, or all or any portion of the Lien on the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	37
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage145"></A>
<A NAME="EX1035CREDITAGREEMENTFINAL_HTM_SC630534DAA546D3A624E1EAD483251D6">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Collateral granted pursuant to this Agreement, is invalid, not binding or unenforceable, in each case unless any such failure is due to any act or omission on the part of the Collateral Agent or the Lenders;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(h)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i) The occurrence of a material breach or default by Borrower under the Escrow Agreement, or (ii) the occurrence of a material breach or default by Halozyme under the Purchase Agreement, in each case, which breach or default is not cured within thirty (30) days after written demand thereof by the Collateral Agent or the Required Lenders;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(i) Any Loan Party shall (A) commence a voluntary case under the Federal bankruptcy laws (as now or hereafter in effect), (B) file a petition seeking to take advantage of any other laws, domestic or foreign, relating to bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, winding up or composition or adjustment of debts, (C) consent to or fail to contest in a timely and appropriate manner any petition filed against it in an involuntary case under such bankruptcy laws or other laws, (D) apply for, or consent to, or fail to contest in a timely and appropriate manner, the appointment of, or the taking of possession by, a receiver, custodian, trustee, liquidator or the like of itself or of a substantial part of its assets, domestic or foreign, (E) admit in writing its inability to pay, or generally not be paying, its debts (other than those that are the subject of bona fide disputes) as they become due, (F) make a general assignment for the benefit of creditors, or (G) take any corporate or limited liability company action, as applicable, for the purpose of effecting any of the foregoing;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:56PX;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	(ii)&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(A) A case or other proceeding shall be commenced against any Loan Party seeking (1) relief under the Federal bankruptcy laws (as now or hereafter in effect) or under any other laws, domestic or foreign, relating to bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, winding up or composition or adjustment of debts, or (2) the appointment of a trustee, receiver, custodian, liquidator or the like of such Loan Party, or of all or any substantial part of its assets, domestic or foreign, and such case or proceeding shall continue undismissed and unstayed for a period of sixty (60) days, or (B) an order granting the relief requested in such case or proceeding against any Loan Party (including an order for relief under such Federal bankruptcy laws) shall be entered;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(j)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The occurrence of (A) any materially adverse effect on the binding nature, validity or enforceability of any Loan Document as an obligation of any Loan Party that is a party thereto, (B) any materially adverse effect on the binding nature, validity or enforceability of either License Agreement as an obligation of Halozyme or Baxalta or Roche, as applicable, (C) any materially adverse effect on the binding nature, validity or enforceability of the Escrow Agreement as an obligation of the Escrow Agent, (D) any materially adverse effect on the binding nature, validity or enforceability of the Purchase Agreement as an obligation of Halozyme, or (E) any material adverse change in any of the rights or remedies of Borrower against Halozyme under the Purchase Agreement;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(k)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Any Person shall be appointed as an Independent Director of the Borrower (other than the Independent Director as of the Closing Date) without (i) at least ten (10) days&#8217; prior written notice to the Collateral Agent and the Lenders of (x) in the case of removal of the Independent Director, the removal of such Independent Director and (y) the proposed appointment of the Independent Director or a successor Independent Director, as applicable, which shall include a certification by the Borrower that such Person has satisfied the criteria set forth in the definition of &#8220;Independent Director&#8221; in the LLC Agreement, in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.05, and (ii) the written acknowledgement by the Collateral Agent or the Lenders that such Person satisfies, in the reasonable judgment of the Collateral Agent or the Lenders (as applicable), the criteria set forth in the definition of &#8220;Independent Director&#8221; in the LLC Agreement (which acknowledgement shall not be unreasonably withheld);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	38
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage146"></A>
<A NAME="EX1035CREDITAGREEMENTFINAL_HTM_SC630534DAA546D3A624E1EAD483251D6">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(l)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Halozyme shall at any time cease to own, of record and beneficially, 100% of the Equity Interests in the Borrower; or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(m)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The payment of the Additional Consideration shall not be made when such payment is due and payable hereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the avoidance of doubt, the Lenders and Borrower confirm that neither (x) the failure to pay or other default by Baxalta under the Baxalta License Agreement, or any delay, elimination or diminution of the amounts paid or payable by Baxalta under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 4.3, 4.6.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Baxalta License Agreement for any reason other than a breach or default by Halozyme of any of its obligations under the Baxalta License Agreement, nor (y) the failure to pay or other default by Roche under the Roche License Agreement, or any delay, elimination or diminution of the amounts paid or payable by Roche under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	4.6.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	9.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	of the Roche License Agreement for any reason other than a breach or default by Halozyme of any of its obligations under the Roche License Agreement, and, in either case, any consequent delay, elimination and reduction of the amounts paid or payable by the Borrower hereunder with respect to the Loan, shall constitute an Event of Default under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.01(a).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	Section 7.02&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Remedies upon Event of D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	efault. Upon the occurrence and during the continuance of any Event of Default:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Acceleration of I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ndebtedness. The Required Lenders may declare all or any part of the Loan (including, for the avoidance of doubt, the applicable Prepayment Premium) immediately due and payable, whereupon the Loan (including, for the avoidance of doubt, the applicable Prepayment Premium) shall become immediately due and payable without presentment, demand, protest, notice or legal process of any kind, all of which are hereby expressly waived by the Borrower (provided, however, that all Loan (including, for the avoidance of doubt, the applicable Prepayment Premium) shall automatically become due and payable upon the occurrence of an Event of Default under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.01(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	with respect to the Borrower);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Other Remed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ies. The Collateral Agent may with the approval of the Required Lenders and shall at the direction of the Required Lenders pursue all other remedies available to it by contract, at law or in equity, including its rights under the Loan Documents.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Right of Set
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	-off. Each Lender may, and is hereby authorized by the Borrower to, at any time and from time to time, to the fullest extent permitted by Applicable Law, without advance notice to the Borrower (any such notice being expressly waived by the Borrower), Set off and apply any and all deposits (general or special, time or demand, provisional or final) at any time held and any other indebtedness at any time owing by such Lender or any of its Affiliates to or for the credit or the account of the Borrower against any or all of the Secured Obligations now or hereafter existing, whether or not such obligations have matured. Each Lender agrees promptly to notify the Borrower, each other Lender and the Collateral Agent after any such Set-off or application;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rovided,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	owever, that the failure to give such notice shall not affect the validity of such Set-off and application.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rights and Remedies Cumulative; Non-Waiver; e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	tc. The enumeration of the Collateral Agent&#8217;s and the Lenders&#8217; rights and remedies set forth in this Agreement is not intended to be exhaustive and the exercise by the Collateral Agent or the Lenders of any right or remedy shall not preclude the exercise of any other rights or remedies, all of which shall be cumulative, and shall be in addition to any other right or remedy given hereunder, under the other Loan Documents or under any other agreement between the Borrower and the Collateral Agent or the Lenders or that may now or hereafter exist in law or in equity or by suit or otherwise. No delay or failure to take action on the part of the Collateral Agent or the Lenders in exercising any right, power or privilege shall operate as a waiver
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	39
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage147"></A>
<A NAME="EX1035CREDITAGREEMENTFINAL_HTM_SC630534DAA546D3A624E1EAD483251D6">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	thereof, nor shall any single or partial exercise of any such right, power or privilege preclude other or further exercise thereof or the exercise of any other right, power or privilege or shall be construed to be a waiver of any Event of Default. No course of dealing between the Loan Parties and the Collateral Agent or the Lenders or their respective agents or employees shall be effective to change, modify or discharge any provision of this Agreement or any of the other Loan Documents or to constitute a waiver of any Event of Default.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;PADDING-TOP:4PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notices to Len
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ders. The Collateral Agent shall deliver to the Lenders any notice of acceleration received by it pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.02(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	and written approval or written direction received by it pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.02(b);
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rovided, that any delivery of or failure to deliver any such notice, approval or direction shall not otherwise alter or effect the rights of the Lenders or the Collateral Agent under this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.02
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.04. In addition, to the extent the Collateral Agent or the Required Lenders deliver any notices to the Borrower with regards to the failure by any Loan Party to perform any covenant, restriction or agreement contained in any Loan Document, the Collateral Agent or the Required Lenders, as applicable, will also deliver such notice to the other Lenders on or about the same time such notice is provided to the Borrower;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	rovided, that the delivery of or failure to deliver such notice to the other Lenders shall not in any way effect the obligations of the Borrower, or the rights of the Collateral Agent or the Required Lenders, in respect of such notice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:96PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Prepayment Premium
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	. The Borrower acknowledges and agrees that if all or any part of the Loan shall be repaid prior to the repayment schedule required by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.04
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;or prior to maturity (including without limitation by acceleration pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.05,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	2.06
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	.02(a)), the Prepayment Premium shall become due and payable by the Borrower upon such repayment or acceleration, whether such acceleration is automatic or is effected by the Collateral Agent&#8217;s or the Lenders&#8217; declaration thereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-TOP:1PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:240%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;PADDING-LEFT:268PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	ARTICLE VIII
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	COLLATERAL
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:125%;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:8PX;TEXT-INDENT:48PX;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;">
	Section 8.01&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Pledge and Grant of Security Interest and L
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ien. (a) The Borrower hereby pledges and collaterally assigns to the Collateral Agent, for the ratable benefit of the Lenders, and hereby grants to the Collateral Agent, for the ratable benefit of the Lenders, a first priority Lien upon and security interest in all of the assets and all real, intangible and personal property of the Borrower (subject only to Permitted Liens), including all of the Borrower&#8217;s right, title and interest in and to the Pledged Royalty Rights and the following other property, in each case, wherever located and whether now owned or at any time hereafter acquired by the Borrower or in which the Borrower now has or at any time in the future may acquire any right, title or interest (such assets and property referred to herein as the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Collateral&#8221;), as security for the prompt and complete payment and performance when due (whether at the stated maturity, by acceleration or otherwise) and observance of all Secured Obligations:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:130%;PADDING-LEFT:54PX;PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:97PX;">
<FONT STYLE="PADDING-BOTTOM:10PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;COLOR:#010000;PADDING-RIGHT:46PX;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	all Accounts;
</FONT>
</DIV>

	(ii)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;PADDING-LEFT:1.3333333333333333PX;">

	all Chattel Paper;
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
